audioUrls.title: firstIntro
audioUrls.urlScript: Hi there! I’m Gus, your tutor and host of VOQA – Voiced Over Q&A. Welcome to our very first quiz session! Whether you're here to challenge your knowledge or just have some fun, you're in the perfect place. Let’s dive in!

audioUrls.title: start1
audioUrls.urlScript: Hi there! Welcome back. Let's get started.

audioUrls.title: start2
audioUrls.urlScript: How you doing? Ready for a new quiz?  Ok, Let's Go.

audioUrls.title: start3
audioUrls.urlScript: Hi! Great to have you back. Let's get started on a new Quiz.

audioUrls.title: next1
audioUrls.urlScript: Next question.

audioUrls.title: next2
audioUrls.urlScript: Ok, let's Move on.

audioUrls.title: next3
audioUrls.urlScript: Ok, Next Question

audioUrls.title: next4
audioUrls.urlScript: Sure, lets skip this on. Going to the next question.

audioUrls.title: repeat1
audioUrls.urlScript: Sure!, I'll repeat the question.

audioUrls.title: repeat2
audioUrls.urlScript: Alright, lets take that last question again.

audioUrls.title: repeat3
audioUrls.urlScript: Ok, this was the last question

audioUrls.title: incorrect1
audioUrls.urlScript: That's not right.

audioUrls.title: incorrect2
audioUrls.urlScript: Nope, that's not it.

audioUrls.title: incorrect3
audioUrls.urlScript: Wrong answer.

audioUrls.title: correct1
audioUrls.urlScript: Correct! Good job.

audioUrls.title: correct2
audioUrls.urlScript: Right on! Nice work.

audioUrls.title: correct3
audioUrls.urlScript: That's it. Well done.

audioUrls.title: noResponse1
audioUrls.urlScript: Didn't get a response. Moving on to the next question

audioUrls.title: noResponse2
audioUrls.urlScript: Emm... No response? Ok. Next question

audioUrls.title: noResponse3
audioUrls.urlScript: Nothing? No worries, you'll get another chance. Let's keep going

audioUrls.urlScript: Alright! ... Ready to Go? ... Let's dive in

audioUrls.title: prepareReview1

audioUrls.title: prepareReview2
audioUrls.urlScript: Alright! That was the last question. Great job on completing the quiz. Let's hear how well... or not ... you performed.

audioUrls.title: prepareReview3
audioUrls.urlScript: And that! ... concludes the quiz! Great Job! Time for a review. Let's check it out

audioUrls.title: goodReview
audioUrls.urlScript: Hey ... that was a great review. So proud to work with you. Let's keep those coming. Deal?

audioUrls.title: goodReview2
audioUrls.urlScript: Nice review! ... If yhou keep practicing, it will only keep getting better I promise.... Keep it up.

audioUrls.title: badReview
audioUrls.urlScript: We all have our good and bad days. But guess what ...  it's not what we do on the good days that count. No worries, buddy, you'll be great at this in no time.

audioUrls.title: badReview2
audioUrls.urlScript: That ... well ... just feels like my coffee got cold. But hey! I'm gonna fire it right back up! How about you?

audioUrls.title: mehReview
audioUrls.urlScript: I'd normally say... not too bad. But honestly, no one likes a 3-star review so ... there is that ... How about some more practice.

audioUrls.title: voqaOutro
audioUrls.urlScript: Thank you for completing yet another audio quiz on Voqa – Voiced Over Q&A!... We hope you had fun and learned something new today. Are you a business or an educational content creator aiming to reach a passionate and engaged audience?... Visit Voqa.io to explore our easy and cost-effective advertising opportunities... and join our growing community of partners. Until your next quiz session...this is Gus, see you soon.
